name: pouchdb-session-authentication
description: Plugin that forces session authentication for PouchDb http adapter

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit
scripts.integration-auth: npm run stop-couch && npm run start-couch && mocha ./test/integration/credentials*.spec.js && npm run stop-couch
scripts.integration-url: npm run stop-couch && npm run start-couch && AUTH_TYPE=url mocha ./test/integration/credentials*.spec.js && npm run stop-couch
scripts.integration-session: npm run stop-couch && npm run start-couch && AUTH_TYPE=session mocha ./test/integration/session*.spec.js && npm run stop-couch
scripts.integration: npm run integration-auth && npm run integration-url && npm run integration-session

author: Diana Barsan
